verses.verse: And it came to pass on the <S%H8066>eighth<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%>, that <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H7121>called<s%> <S%H175>Aaron<s%> and his <S%H1121>sons<s%>, and the <S%H2205>elders<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>;

And he <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H175>Aaron<s%>, <S%H3947>Take<s%> you a <S%H1241>young<s%> <S%H5695>calf<s%> for a sin <S%H2403>offering<s%>, and a <S%H352>ram<s%> for a burnt <S%H5930>offering<s%>, outside <S%H8549>blemish<s%>, and <S%H7126>offer<s%> them <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>.

And unto the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> you shall <S%H1696>speak<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>, <S%H3947>Take<s%> you a <S%H8163>kid<s%> of the <S%H5795>goats<s%> for a sin <S%H2403>offering<s%>; and a <S%H5695>calf<s%> and a <S%H3532>lamb<s%>, both of the <S%H1121>first<s%> <S%H8141>year<s%>, outside <S%H8549>blemish<s%>, for a burnt <S%H5930>offering<s%>;

Also a <S%H7794>bullock<s%> and a <S%H352>ram<s%> for peace <S%H8002>offerings<s%>, to <S%H2076>sacrifice<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>; and a food <S%H4503>offering<s%> <S%H1101>mingled<s%> with <S%H8081>oil<s%>: for to <S%H3117>day<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> will appear unto <S%H7200>you<s%>.

And they <S%H3947>brought<s%> that which <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H6680>commanded<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H168>tabernacle<s%> of the <S%H4150>congregation<s%>: and all the <S%H5712>congregation<s%> drew <S%H7126>near<s%> and <S%H5975>stood<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>.

And <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H559>said<s%>, This is the <S%H1697>thing<s%> which the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H6680>commanded<s%> that you should <S%H6213>do<s%>: and the <S%H3519>glory<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> shall appear unto <S%H7200>you<s%>.

And <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H175>Aaron<s%>, <S%H7126>Go<s%> unto the <S%H4196>altar<s%>, and <S%H6213>offer<s%> your sin <S%H2403>offering<s%>, and your burnt <S%H5930>offering<s%>, and make an <S%H3722>atonement<s%> for <S%H5971>yourself<s%>, and for the people: and <S%H6213>offer<s%> the <S%H7133>offering<s%> of the <S%H5971>people<s%>, and make an <S%H3722>atonement<s%> for <S%H3068>them<s%>; as the Lord <S%H6680>commanded<s%>.
<S%H175>Aaron<s%> therefore <S%H7126>went<s%> unto the <S%H4196>altar<s%>, and <S%H7819>killed<s%> the <S%H5695>calf<s%> of the sin <S%H2403>offering<s%>, which was for himself.

And the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H175>Aaron<s%> <S%H7126>brought<s%> the <S%H1818>blood<s%> unto <S%H2881>him<s%>: and he dipped his <S%H676>finger<s%> in the <S%H1818>blood<s%>, and <S%H5414>put<s%> it upon the <S%H7161>horns<s%> of the <S%H4196>altar<s%>, and <S%H3332>poured<s%> out the <S%H1818>blood<s%> at the <S%H3247>bottom<s%> of the <S%H4196>altar<s%>:

But the <S%H2459>fat<s%>, and the <S%H3629>kidneys<s%>, and the <S%H3508>membrane<s%> <S%H4480>above<s%> the <S%H3516>liver<s%> of the sin <S%H2403>offering<s%>, he <S%H6999>burnt<s%> upon the <S%H4196>altar<s%>; as the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H6680>commanded<s%> <S%H4872>Moses<s%>.
And the <S%H1320>flesh<s%> and the <S%H5785>hide<s%> he <S%H8313>burnt<s%> with <S%H784>fire<s%> <S%H2351>outside<s%> the <S%H4264>camp<s%>.

And he <S%H7819>killed<s%> the burnt <S%H5930>offering<s%>; and <S%H175>Aaron<s%>'s <S%H1121>sons<s%> <S%H4672>presented<s%> unto him the <S%H1818>blood<s%>, which he <S%H2236>sprinkled<s%> round <S%H5439>about<s%> upon the <S%H4196>altar<s%>.
And they <S%H4672>presented<s%> the burnt <S%H5930>offering<s%> unto <S%H5409>him<s%>, with the pieces <S%H7218>there<s%>, and the head: and he <S%H6999>burnt<s%> them upon the <S%H4196>altar<s%>.
And he did <S%H7364>wash<s%> the <S%H7130>innards<s%> and the <S%H3767>legs<s%>, and <S%H6999>burnt<s%> them upon the burnt <S%H5930>offering<s%> on the <S%H4196>altar<s%>.

And he <S%H7126>brought<s%> the <S%H5971>people<s%>'s <S%H7133>offering<s%>, and <S%H3947>took<s%> the <S%H8163>goat<s%>, which was the sin <S%H2403>offering<s%> for the <S%H5971>people<s%>, and <S%H7819>killed<s%> <S%H2398>it<s%>, and offered it for sin, as the <S%H7223>first<s%>.
And he <S%H7126>brought<s%> the burnt <S%H5930>offering<s%>, and <S%H6213>offered<s%> it according to the <S%H4941>manner<s%>.

And he <S%H7126>brought<s%> the food <S%H4503>offering<s%>, and <S%H4390>took<s%> an <S%H3709>handful<s%> <S%H6999>there<s%>, and burnt it upon the <S%H4196>altar<s%>, <S%H905>beside<s%> the burnt <S%H5930>sacrifice<s%> of the <S%H1242>morning<s%>.

He <S%H7819>killed<s%> also the <S%H7794>bullock<s%> and the <S%H352>ram<s%> for a <S%H2077>sacrifice<s%> of peace <S%H8002>offerings<s%>, which was for the <S%H5971>people<s%>: and <S%H175>Aaron<s%>'s <S%H1121>sons<s%> <S%H4672>presented<s%> unto him the <S%H1818>blood<s%>, which he <S%H2236>sprinkled<s%> upon the <S%H4196>altar<s%> round <S%H5439>about<s%>,

And the <S%H2459>fat<s%> of the <S%H7794>bullock<s%> and of the <S%H352>ram<s%>, the <S%H451>rump<s%>, and that which <S%H4374>covers<s%> the <S%H3629>innards<s%>, and the kidneys, and the <S%H3508>membrane<s%> above the <S%H3516>liver<s%>:
And they <S%H7760>put<s%> the <S%H2459>fat<s%> upon the <S%H2373>breasts<s%>, and he <S%H6999>burnt<s%> the <S%H2459>fat<s%> upon the <S%H4196>altar<s%>:

And the <S%H2373>breasts<s%> and the <S%H3225>right<s%> <S%H7785>shoulder<s%> <S%H175>Aaron<s%> <S%H5130>waved<s%> for a wave <S%H8573>offering<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>; as <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H6680>commanded<s%>.

And <S%H175>Aaron<s%> lifted <S%H5375>up<s%> his <S%H3027>hand<s%> toward the <S%H5971>people<s%>, and <S%H1288>blessed<s%> <S%H3381>them<s%>, and came down from <S%H6213>offering<s%> of the sin <S%H2403>offering<s%>, and the burnt <S%H5930>offering<s%>, and peace <S%H8002>offerings<s%>.

And <S%H4872>Moses<s%> and <S%H175>Aaron<s%> <S%H935>went<s%> into the <S%H168>tabernacle<s%> of the <S%H4150>congregation<s%>, and came <S%H3318>out<s%>, and <S%H1288>blessed<s%> the <S%H5971>people<s%>: and the <S%H3519>glory<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H7200>appeared<s%> unto all the <S%H5971>people<s%>.

And there <S%H3318>came<s%> a <S%H784>fire<s%> out from <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>, and <S%H398>consumed<s%> upon the <S%H4196>altar<s%> the burnt <S%H5930>offering<s%> and the <S%H2459>fat<s%>: which when all the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H7200>saw<s%>, they <S%H7442>shouted<s%>, and <S%H5307>fell<s%> on their <S%H6440>faces<s%>.
